movies.title: Black Panther Wakanda Forever
movies.description: At first glance, you might think that Wakanda is the usual territory of wild Africa, but this is not so. Here, in the bowels of the desert lands, there are deposits of a unique metal that can absorb vibrations.

movies.title: Kung-fu panda 3 Reunion with father
movies.description: At first glance, you might think that Wakanda is the usual territory of wild Africa, but this is not so. Here, in the bowels of the desert lands, there are deposits of a unique metal that can absorb vibrations.

movies.title: Fury (2014)
movies.description: The film is set at the end of World War II in Nazi Germany. A group of American soldiers are planning a daring military operation.

movies.title: Cyberpunk
movies.description: CYBERPUNK: EDGERUNNERS TELLS A STANDALONE, 10-EPISODE STORY ABOUT A STREET KID TRYING TO SURVIVE IN A TECHNOLOGY AND BODY MODIFICATION-OBSESSED CITY OF THE FUTURE.
